tree_prefetch.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ===========================================
00002 !
00003 !           TREE_PREFETCH
00004 !
00005 !   $Revision: 446 $
00006 !
00007 !  Exchange non-local multipole information used at last timestep
00008 !  as 'prefetch' for tree walk.
00009 !
00010 !
00011 ! ===========================================
00012 
00013 subroutine tree_prefetch(itime)
00014 
00015   use treevars
00016   use tree_utils
00017   implicit none
00018   include 'mpif.h'
00019 
00020   integer, intent(in) :: itime
00021   ! Key arrays (64-bit)
00022 
00023   integer*8, dimension(size_fetch) :: sort_key, remove_keys, nofetch_keys ! List of deleted keys
00024   integer*8, dimension(size_fetch) :: req_parent, req_compress, fetch_parent, fetch_comp, absent   ! work arrays
00025   integer, dimension(size_fetch) :: fetch_owner, sort_owner, indx   ! work arrays
00026 
00027   integer*8, dimension(8) :: sub_key, key_child, child_sub, child_key, next_child, siblings
00028 
00029   integer, dimension(0:num_pe-1) :: &
00030        nremove, &              ! # keys deleted from request list
00031        nadd, &                 ! # new ones added
00032        nnofetch, &             ! # keys to delete from fetch list
00033        sstrides, &              ! fence posts for remove lists
00034        rstrides, &              ! fence posts for remove lists
00035        istart, ic_start, &     ! # fenceposts
00036        nplace,&                ! # children (new entries) to place in table
00037        nchild_ship       ! # children shipped to others
00038   integer :: ierr
00039   integer*8, dimension(size_fetch) :: last_child   ! List of 'last' children fetched from remote PEs
00040 
00041   logical, dimension(size_fetch) :: key_present, duplicate
00042 
00043   ! Key working vars
00044   integer :: ship_byte, ship_leaves, ship_node, ship_address
00045   integer*8 :: ship_next, ship_key
00046   integer :: recv_byte, recv_leaves, recv_node, recv_address
00047   integer*8 :: recv_next, recv_key, recv_parent
00048   integer*8 :: kparent, kin, search_key
00049   integer :: nodchild, nlast_child, newtwig, newleaf, hashaddr, nuniq, npar, nabsent
00050   integer :: cchild, nchild, node_addr, addr_parent, child_byte
00051   integer :: i, j, k, ic, ipe, iwait, inner_pass, nhops, nreqs_new, nreqs_old, nfetch_new         ! loop counters
00052   integer :: iofile,pe_1
00053   integer :: size_remove, sum_reqs, nreq_max, nfetch_max,  timestamp, send_prop_count, recv_count, nnot_local
00054   character*1 :: ctick
00055   character(30) :: cfile, ccol1, ccol2, ccol0
00056   integer :: sum_prefetches
00057 
00058   ! external functions
00059   integer :: key2addr        ! Mapping function to get hash table address from key
00060   integer*8 :: next_node   ! Function to get next node key for local tree walk
00061   logical :: key_local   ! Tests whether key present in local # table
00062   logical :: prefetch_summary=.true.
00063 
00064   iofile = ipefile
00065   iofile = 6
00066 !  if (me==255) prefetch_debug=.true.
00067   !
00068   if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,'(a,i6)') 'TREE PREFETCH for timestep ',itime
00069   if (me.eq.0 .and. walk_summary) write(*,'(a,i6)') 'LPEPC | TREE PREFETCH for timestep ',itime
00070   timestamp=itime
00071 
00072 
00073   ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074   ! PASS 1:  
00075   !   Recursively examine fetched-key lists to check whether parents exist locally
00076   !   Add absent parents to fetched-key lists for re-copy
00077   ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 
00079       ! Sort complete prefetch list according to owner
00080       if (sum_fetches>0) then
00081         call indexsort(fetched_owner, indx, sum_fetches, maxaddress)
00082       else
00083 ! nothing to do
00084         return
00085       endif
00086 
00087      do i=1,sum_fetches
00088          sort_key(i)=fetched_keys(indx(i))
00089          sort_owner(i)=fetched_owner(indx(i))
00090      end do
00091 
00092   do ipe=0,num_pe-1
00093      if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,*) 'PASS 1: Fetches for PE ',ipe
00094      npar = nfetch_total(ipe) 
00095      fetch_comp(1:npar) = fetched_keys(1:npar)  ! Work array - owner order not important here
00096      nfetch_new = npar  ! New list length
00097 
00098      do while (npar>0)  ! Loop recursively back up tree until all absent ancestors identified
00099 
00100         if (prefetch_debug) call sort(fetch_comp(1:npar))   ! Sort key list for debugging
00101         nnot_local = 0
00102         do i=1,npar
00103            fetch_parent(i) = ishft( fetch_comp(i),-3)  ! Parent keys of fetch-list
00104            key_present(i) = key_local( fetch_parent(i) ) ! Check whether parent node present locally
00105            if( .not.key_present(i)) then
00106               nnot_local=nnot_local+1! Count absentees
00107               absent(nnot_local) = fetch_parent(i) ! Make list of absent parents
00108            endif
00109         end do
00110 
00111 !        if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,'(a,i6/(2o15,l3))') &
00112 !       'Old fetch list   Parents    Present ',npar,(fetch_comp(i),fetch_parent(i),key_present(i),i=1,npar)
00113 
00114         call sort(absent(1:nnot_local))   ! Sort absentee list
00115 
00116         absent(nnot_local+1) = 0 ! dummy at end
00117 
00118         call unique(absent,nnot_local) ! Identify unique keys and compress list
00119         nabsent=nnot_local
00120 
00121         fetch_comp(1:nabsent) = absent(1:nabsent) ! buffer for next level up
00122 
00123         npar = nabsent
00124         fetched_keys(nfetch_new+1:nfetch_new+nabsent) = absent(1:nabsent)  ! Add absent keys to list
00125         nfetch_new = nfetch_new + nabsent
00126 
00127      end do
00128 
00129      call sort(fetched_keys(1:nfetch_new))   ! Sort augmented list
00130      fetched_keys(nfetch_new+1) = 0 ! dummy at end
00131      call unique(fetched_keys(1:nfetch_new),nfetch_new) ! Remove duplicates
00132 
00133      if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,'(a,i6/(o15))') 'New fetch list: ',nfetch_new,(fetched_keys(i),i=1,nfetch_new)
00134      nfetch_total(ipe) = nfetch_new   ! New # keys to fetch
00135   end do
00136 
00137   !  Get fence posts for key swap
00138 
00139   sstrides = (/ (i*size_fetch,i=0,num_pe-1) /)
00140   rstrides = sstrides
00141 
00142 !  call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00143   !  Send new fetch-list totals to destination PEs
00144   call MPI_ALLTOALL( nfetch_total, 1, MPI_INTEGER, nreqs_total, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00145   sum_reqs = SUM(nreqs_total)
00146 
00147   !  Do key-swap to update request lists
00148   call MPI_ALLTOALLV( fetched_keys,   nfetch_new, sstrides, MPI_INTEGER8, &
00149        requested_keys, sum_reqs, rstrides, MPI_INTEGER8, &
00150        MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00151 
00152 
00153   ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00154   ! PASS 2:  - compare request lists with new local tree nodes
00155   !          - flag and remove keys which no longer exist
00156   ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00157 
00158   if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,'(/a)') '-----------------------'
00159 
00160   do ipe = 0,num_pe-1
00161      nremove(ipe) = 0
00162      nreqs_new=0
00163      if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,*) 'PASS 2: Requests from PE ',ipe
00164      do i=1,nreqs_total(ipe)
00165         key_present(i) = key_local(requested_keys(i))
00166         if (key_present(i)) then
00167            nreqs_new=nreqs_new+1
00168            req_compress(nreqs_new)=requested_keys(i)
00169            ctick = ''
00170         else
00171            ! tag key as non existent and add to remove list
00172            nremove(ipe) = nremove(ipe) + 1
00173            remove_keys(nremove(ipe)) = requested_keys(i)
00174            ctick = 'N'
00175         endif
00176         if (prefetch_debug)  write(iofile,'(o15,2x,a1)') requested_keys(i),ctick
00177      end do
00178 
00179      ! remove non-existent keys
00180      ! could do something more sophisticated here, like suggesting alternative key
00181      ! but for now let tree_walk routine deal with missing keys
00182 
00183 
00184      nreqs_total(ipe) = nreqs_new
00185      nreqs_old = nreqs_new
00186 
00187      if (prefetch_summary) write(iofile,'(a,i8/(o15))') 'Keys removed: ', nremove(ipe),(remove_keys(i),i=1,nremove(ipe))
00188 
00189      ! TODO: Check that sibling sets complete so that parent's 'HERE' flag can be set in childcode.
00190      ! Need this so that tree_walk MAC options still function as-is
00191 
00192 
00193      ! First make list of parent keys from compressed list
00194 
00195      call sort(req_compress(1:nreqs_new))   ! Sort key list
00196      req_parent(1:nreqs_new) = ishft( req_compress(1:nreqs_new),-3)
00197 
00198      if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,'(a,i6/(2o15))') & 
00199         'Compressed list   Parents ',nreqs_new,(req_compress(i),req_parent(i),i=1,nreqs_new)
00200      req_parent(nreqs_new+1) = 0
00201      nuniq= nreqs_new         ! Count them
00202      call unique(req_parent(1:nuniq),nuniq)     ! Remove duplicates
00203      if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,'(a,i6/(o15))') 'Unique parents ',nuniq,(req_parent(i),i=1,nuniq)
00204 
00205 
00206  ! Make new list of requested children from parent list
00207  !  - this may include nodes created by tree_fill
00208 
00209 
00210      nreqs_new = 0
00211 
00212      do i=1,nuniq
00213         cchild = htable( key2addr( req_parent(i), 'PREFETCH: pass 2') )%childcode   !  Children byte-code
00214         nchild = SUM( (/ (ibits(cchild,j,1),j=0,7) /) ) ! # children = sum of bits in byte-code
00215         sub_key(1:nchild) = pack( bitarr, mask=(/ (btest(cchild,j),j=0,7) /) )  ! Extract child sub-keys from byte code           
00216         requested_keys(nreqs_new+1:nreqs_new+nchild) = IOR( ishft(req_parent(i),3 ), sub_key(1:nchild) ) ! New siblings of original requested key
00217         nreqs_new = nreqs_new + nchild
00218      end do
00219      nreqs_total(ipe) = nreqs_new
00220      nadd(ipe) = nreqs_new-nreqs_old
00221   end do
00222 
00223 !  call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00224   !  Send new request-list totals to requesting PEs
00225   call MPI_ALLTOALL( nreqs_total, 1, MPI_INTEGER, nfetch_total, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00226 
00227   sum_reqs = SUM(nreqs_total)
00228   sum_fetches = SUM(nfetch_total)
00229 
00230   call MPI_ALLTOALLV( requested_keys, sum_reqs,   sstrides, MPI_INTEGER8, &
00231        fetched_keys, sum_fetches, rstrides, MPI_INTEGER8, &
00232        MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00233 
00234   ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00235   ! PASS 3: final sweep of fetched-key lists to eliminate nodes which 
00236   !         might have been created locally during tree_fill.
00237   ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00238 
00239   if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,'(/a)') '-----------------------'
00240 
00241    do ipe = 0,num_pe-1
00242      if (ipe /= me) then
00243         if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,*) 'PASS 3: Fetches from PE ',ipe
00244         npar = nfetch_total(ipe)
00245         fetch_comp(1:npar) = fetched_keys(1:npar)  ! Work array
00246         key_present(1:npar) = (/ (key_local( fetch_comp(i) ),i=1,npar) /) ! Check whether node already present locally
00247         nnot_local = count(mask = .not.key_present(1:npar))     ! Count absentees
00248         if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,'(a,i6/(o15,l3))') 'Fetch list  Present ',npar,(fetch_comp(i),key_present(i),i=1,npar)
00249         nfetch_new = nnot_local
00250         fetched_keys(1:nfetch_new) = &
00251              pack( fetch_comp(1:npar), mask = .not.key_present(1:npar) ) ! Make list of absent keys
00252         nfetch_total(ipe) = nfetch_new   ! New # keys to fetch
00253      endif
00254   end do
00255 
00256 !  call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00257   !  Send new fetch-list totals to destination PEs
00258   call MPI_ALLTOALL( nfetch_total, 1, MPI_INTEGER, nreqs_total, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00259 
00260   sum_reqs = SUM(nreqs_total)
00261   sum_fetches = SUM(nfetch_total)
00262   !  Do key-swap to update request lists
00263   call MPI_ALLTOALLV( fetched_keys,   sum_fetches, sstrides, MPI_INTEGER8, &
00264        requested_keys, sum_reqs, rstrides, MPI_INTEGER8, &
00265        MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00266 
00267 
00268   if (prefetch_summary.or.prefetch_debug) then
00269      nreq_max=maxval(nreqs_total)
00270      nfetch_max=maxval(nfetch_total)
00271      ! Insert dummy values
00272      do ipe=0,num_pe-1
00273         requested_keys(nreqs_total(ipe)+1:nreq_max) = 0
00274         fetched_keys(nfetch_total(ipe)+1:nfetch_max) = 0
00275      end do
00276 
00277      ! formatting for fetch/request lists
00278      if (num_pe<10) then
00279         ccol0='(//a3,i5,a,i7/3(a15,'//achar(mod(num_pe,10)+48)//'i15/),a/)'
00280         ccol1='(//a,i7/'//achar(mod(num_pe,10)+48)//'i15/a/)'
00281         ccol2='('//achar(mod(num_pe,10)+48)//'o15)'
00282         pe_1 = 0
00283      else
00284         ccol0='(//a,i7/3(a15,'//achar(num_pe/10+48)//achar(mod(num_pe,10)+48)//'i15/),a/)'
00285         ccol1='(//a,i7/'//achar(num_pe/10+48)//achar(mod(num_pe,10)+48)//'i15/a/)'
00286         ccol2='('//achar(num_pe/10+48)//achar(mod(num_pe,10)+48)//'o15)'
00287         pe_1=num_pe-10
00288      endif
00289 !     write(iofile,ccol0) 'CPU ',me,': Key prefetch at timestep ', &
00290       write(iofile,*) 'CPU ',me,': Key prefetch at timestep ', &
00291         timestamp,'requested:',nreqs_total(pe_1:num_pe-1),'removed:',nremove(pe_1:num_pe-1),'added:',nadd(pe_1:num_pe-1), &
00292         '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------'
00293   endif
00294   if (prefetch_debug) then
00295      do i=1,nreq_max
00296         write(iofile,*) 'Keys requested at timestep ',timestamp
00297         write(iofile,*) (requested_keys(i))
00298      end do
00299 
00300 !     write(iofile,ccol1) 'Keys fetched at timestep ',timestamp,nfetch_total(pe_1:num_pe-1), &
00301      write(iofile,*) 'Keys fetched at timestep ',timestamp,nfetch_total(pe_1:num_pe-1), &
00302           '------------------------------------------------------------'
00303      do i=1,nfetch_max
00304         write(iofile,*) (fetched_owner(i),fetched_keys(i))
00305      end do
00306   endif
00307 
00308 
00309   ! Now ready for all-to-all multipole swap
00310 
00311   ! Prepare send buffer: pack multipole info together as in tree_walk.
00312   send_prop_count = 0
00313   nlast_child = 0
00314 
00315   do ipe=0,num_pe-1
00316      !     sstrides(ipe) = send_prop_count  ! prestore fencepost
00317      do i=1,nreqs_total(ipe)
00318         send_prop_count = send_prop_count + 1
00319         ship_key = requested_keys(i)
00320         ship_address = key2addr(ship_key,'PREFETCH: preship')  ! # address
00321         ship_node = htable(ship_address)%node
00322         ship_byte = IAND( htable( ship_address )%childcode,255 ) ! Catch lowest 8 bits of childbyte - filter off requested and here flags 
00323         ship_leaves = htable( ship_address )%leaves                    ! # contained leaves
00324 
00325         !  Need to reset ship_next=-1 if node is last of children
00326         kparent = ishft(ship_key ,-3 )
00327         addr_parent = key2addr(kparent,'PREFETCH: parent  ')
00328         child_byte = htable( addr_parent )%childcode            !  Children byte-code
00329         nchild = SUM( (/ (ibits(child_byte,j,1),j=0,7) /) )       ! # children = sum of bits in byte-code
00330         child_sub(1:nchild) = pack( bitarr, mask=(/ (btest(child_byte,j),j=0,7) /) )  ! Extract child sub-keys from byte code
00331         child_key(1:nchild) = IOR( ishft(kparent,3), child_sub(1:nchild) )         ! Construct keys of children
00332 
00333         if (ship_key == child_key(nchild) ) then   
00334            ship_next = -1      ! last of siblings or only child
00335         else
00336            ship_next = htable( ship_address )%next   ! Node has elder siblings
00337         endif
00338 
00339         pack_child(send_prop_count) =  multipole ( ship_key, &
00340              ship_byte, &
00341              ship_leaves, &
00342              me, &
00343              ship_next, &
00344              charge( ship_node ), &
00345              abs_charge( ship_node ), &
00346              xcoc( ship_node), &
00347              ycoc( ship_node), &
00348              zcoc( ship_node), &
00349              xdip( ship_node), &
00350              ydip( ship_node), &
00351              zdip( ship_node), &
00352              xxquad( ship_node), &
00353              yyquad( ship_node), &
00354              zzquad( ship_node), &
00355              xyquad( ship_node), &
00356              yzquad( ship_node), &
00357              zxquad( ship_node), &
00358              jx( ship_node), &
00359              jy( ship_node), &
00360              jz( ship_node), &
00361              magmx( ship_node), &
00362              magmy( ship_node), &
00363              magmz( ship_node) )
00364      end do
00365   end do
00366 
00367   sstrides = (/ 0, nreqs_total(0), ( SUM( nreqs_total(0:i-1) ),i=2,num_pe-1 ) /)
00368   rstrides = (/ 0, nfetch_total(0), ( SUM( nfetch_total(0:i-1) ),i=2,num_pe-1 ) /)
00369 
00370   ! write (iofile,'((2i8))') (sstrides(i), rstrides(i), i=0,num_pe-1) 
00371   if (prefetch_debug) then
00372      pe_1=245
00373      send_prop_count=1
00374      write (*,*) 'Shipping buffer from ',255
00375      do ipe=pe_1,num_pe-1
00376         write(*,*) 'To ',ipe
00377         do i=1,nreqs_total(ipe)
00378            write (*,'(2i5,o25,i10)') i,send_prop_count,pack_child(send_prop_count)%key,pack_child(send_prop_count)%leaves
00379            send_prop_count=send_prop_count+1
00380         end do
00381      end do
00382   endif
00383 
00384   ! Ship multipole data
00385   call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00386   call MPI_ALLTOALLV( pack_child,   nreqs_total, sstrides, MPI_TYPE_MULTIPOLE, &
00387        get_child, nfetch_total, rstrides, MPI_TYPE_MULTIPOLE, &
00388        MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00389 
00390   ! Make new hash entries with newly-fetched nodes
00391   recv_count = 0
00392   nlast_child = 0
00393   newleaf = 0
00394   newtwig = 0
00395 
00396   do ipe=0,num_pe-1
00397      do i=1, nfetch_total(ipe)
00398         recv_count=recv_count+1
00399         recv_key = get_child(recv_count)%key
00400         recv_parent = ishft( recv_key,-3 )
00401         recv_byte = get_child(recv_count)%byte
00402         recv_leaves = get_child(recv_count)%leaves
00403         recv_next = get_child(recv_count)%next
00404 
00405         if (recv_leaves ==1 ) then
00406            newleaf = newleaf + 1
00407            nleaf = nleaf + 1
00408            nodchild = nleaf
00409            n_children(nodchild) = 0
00410            first_child(nodchild) = recv_key
00411 
00412         else if (recv_leaves > 1) then
00413            newtwig = newtwig + 1
00414            ntwig = ntwig + 1
00415            nodchild =  -ntwig
00416            nchild = SUM( (/ (ibits(recv_byte,j,1),j=0,7) /) )   ! Get # children
00417            n_children( nodchild ) = nchild       
00418            sub_key(1:nchild) = pack( bitarr(0:7), mask=(/ (btest(recv_byte,j),j=0,7) /) )  ! Extract child sub-keys from byte code
00419            first_child( nodchild ) = IOR( ishft( recv_key,3), sub_key(1) )              ! Construct key of 1st (grand)child
00420 
00421         else
00422            write(*,'(a,i5,a,i5)') 'LPEPC | PREFETCH on ',me,' Bad twig received from PE ',ipe
00423            write(*,'(a,o25)') '# leaves <=0 for received child node ',recv_key
00424            write(*,'(a,2i10)') 'recv count, i ',recv_count,i
00425            write(*,'(a,i10)') '# leaves ',recv_leaves
00426            write(*,*) get_child(recv_count)
00427            write(*,'(a,i5)') 'LPEPC | ... key will be ignored' 
00428         endif
00429 
00430         if (recv_leaves>=1 .and. recv_leaves<=10*npp) then   ! insert valid keys
00431         ! Insert new node into local #-table
00432 
00433          call make_hashentry( recv_key, nodchild, recv_leaves, recv_byte, ipe, hashaddr, ierr )
00434 
00435          htable(hashaddr)%next = recv_next           ! Fill in special next-node pointer for non-local children
00436          node_addr =  key2addr( recv_parent,'PREFETCH: MNHE ')
00437          htable( node_addr )%childcode = IBSET(  htable( node_addr )%childcode, 9) ! Set children_HERE flag for parent node
00438 
00439          node_level( nodchild ) = log(1.*recv_key)/log(8.)  ! get level from keys and prestore as node property
00440 
00441         ! Physical properties
00442 
00443         charge( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%q
00444         abs_charge( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%absq
00445         xcoc( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%xcoc
00446         ycoc( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%ycoc
00447         zcoc( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%zcoc
00448         xdip( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%xdip
00449         ydip( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%ydip
00450         zdip( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%zdip
00451 
00452         xxquad( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%xxquad
00453         yyquad( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%yyquad
00454         zzquad( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%zzquad
00455         xyquad( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%xyquad
00456         yzquad( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%yzquad
00457         zxquad( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%zxquad
00458 
00459         jx( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%jx
00460         jy( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%jy
00461         jz( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%jz
00462 
00463         magmx( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%magmx
00464         magmy( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%magmy
00465         magmz( nodchild ) = get_child(recv_count)%magmz
00466         endif
00467  ! Put last child onto list for post-traversal processing
00468         if (recv_next == -1) then
00469            nlast_child = nlast_child + 1
00470            last_child(nlast_child) = recv_key
00471         endif
00472 
00473         if (prefetch_debug) write(iofile,'(a,o15,a,i7,a,o13)') &
00474              'Prefetch: ',recv_key,' from ',ipe,' parent key ',recv_parent
00475 
00476      end do
00477   end do
00478 
00479   !  Determine 'next_node' pointers for 'last child' list in local tree
00480   ! - these differ from pointers in NL tree from which nodes were sent
00481   !  This  ensures that traversals in tree_walk treat pre-fetched nodes as local,
00482   !  avoiding deferral list completely.
00483 
00484   do i = 1,nlast_child
00485      search_key = last_child(i)                   
00486      node_addr = key2addr(search_key,'PREFETCH: NN search ')
00487      htable( node_addr )%next = next_node(search_key)  !   Get next sibling, uncle, great-uncle in local tree
00488   end do
00489 
00490 ! Get max # multipole ships from prefetch 
00491  sum_prefetches = MAXVAL(nfetch_total)
00492  call MPI_ALLREDUCE( sum_prefetches, max_prefetches, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr ) 
00493 
00494 end subroutine tree_prefetch
00495
Generated on Tue Jan 23 16:02:50 2007 for PEPC by  1.4.7-20060810
